Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 11:00 PM ADT Sunday 23 April 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 9.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 23 April 2023
